title: Blot 1.2.0 (Mac App Store)
description:
Description

Meet Blot, a cheeky and fun loving blob of ink!

Blot has decided to go on an adventure and you get to come too!

Help Blot duck and weave his way across the page avoiding all the pencils and thumbtacks that stand in his way. Ride a streak of paint, grab some coins, buy some awesome outfits and exciting tools to help Blot achieve a new distance record.

Don't forget to pick up your Boost Buddies along the way to charge up your Boost Power and blast your way forward!

Let the wind blow through Blot's ink and have some fun!

Highlights include:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ High speed, nail biting action
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Simple single click gameplay
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Equippable tools to help Blot get that extra millimetre or coin
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Boost Buddies to power up your invulnerable Boost Power
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Over 30 wacky outfits
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 4 different color paints to dip Blot in, each with their own unique power
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Hand drawn backgrounds (inspired by boring meetings and high school textbooks)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Achievements
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ In-App purchases to help you get geared up faster

Requirements: Mac OS X 10.7 or later

What's New in Version 1.2.0

----------

Happy 4th of July!

To celebrate America's independence Blot is recreating Paul Revere's Midnight Ride, a brand new Challenge Mode. Light the lanterns, beat the clock on Paul's ride from Boston to Concord and enjoy the fireworks!

Blot is now free!

Included are 8 brand new outfits, dress Blot in your favourite 4th of July costume and celebrate in style!

Don't think we have forgotten the tools either. Along with a brand new tool, Blot has also gained a Tool Belt allowing up to three tools to be equipped at once! What powerful combinations will you discover?

Additionally, we squashed some bugs!


if you like it - buy it
